description:
No signal, no problem. Smaller and lighter than most energy bars, the Defy satellite link pairs with your phone over Bluetooth and keeps you connected when you’re off-the-grid. Through the free Bullitt satellite messaging app, you can text, email, send GPS location check-ins and SOS messages, giving you and your loved ones, peace of mind. The first year of essential messaging is included for free, additional messaging requires a subscription.

  • Skylo® satellite network uses existing Geosynchronous Equatorial Orbit (GEO) satellites
  • Canada, CONUS and Western Europe covered with expanded coverage planned for the near future. For more information on coverage, see https://bullitt.com/coverage/
  • Offshore coverage withing 120km of coverer land mass
  • Free Bullitt™ messenger app lets you text your contact through the app and your contact gets your text like a normal text – if your contact would like to reply, they need to use the Bullitt app
  • Includes 1 free year of the essential messaging plan, which includes up to 30 messages a month, anytime SOS, and check-ins
  • Check-in feature lets your pre-determined contacts know where you are via latitude and longitude
  • Smart notifications (emails, texts, alerts, etc.) via Bluetooth™ connection
  • SOS messaging calls rescuers to your exact GPS location
  • Focuspoint® International emergency response center with 24/7/365 staffing receives SOS messages
  • Trigger SOS messages from phone or device
  • Bullitt app cycles between satellite, cellular and WiFi communication, choosing the most affordable option
  • IP68 dust and waterproofing protection
  • Mil Spec 810H impact, vibration, and thermal protection
  • LED alert lights for power, SOS, check-in and messages
  • 600mAh battery provides up to 4 days of battery life in standby mode
  • Easy USB-C charging
  • Audible and haptic alerts, so if you can’t hear a notification, you should be able to feel it
  • Integrated D-ring offers carrying options
  • In the box: Defy satellite link, webbing strap with D-ring, eSim activation code, USB cable and documentation
name: Motorola Defy Satellite Link
